instructions:
All rolls use a similar formula: roll 1d20 + Modifier + #d6k1

The #d6k1 is the Roll20 version of roll some d6 and keep the highest one, and is how boons and banes are supported. Boons are a positive number of d6, banes are negative.

When the Boons or Banes popup appears, enter the number of d6 to use.
